# Pull Request

## Description

Brief description of changes made.

## Type of Change

Please delete options that are not relevant:

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] CI/CD pipeline changes

## Changes Made

- [ ] Modified C extension code
- [ ] Updated Docker configuration
- [ ] Added/modified tests
- [ ] Updated documentation
- [ ] Changed build scripts

## Testing

- [ ] C extension builds successfully (`make dev`)
- [ ] All tests pass (`make test`)
- [ ] Pre-commit hooks pass (`make pre-commit`)
- [ ] Jupyter environment works (`make jupyter`)
- [ ] Docker multi-stage build works

## Performance Impact

- [ ] No performance impact
- [ ] Performance improved
- [ ] Performance regression (explain why acceptable)

## Documentation

- [ ] Code is self-documenting
- [ ] Added/updated docstrings
- [ ] Updated README if needed
- [ ] Added inline comments for complex logic

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

## Additional Notes

Any additional information, configuration changes, or notes for reviewers.
